creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: standing figure--nearly all of image above shoulders lost; figure wears fur wrap, sword at waist and boots with spurs; sword fight, figure on horse and other figures and buildings far in background; affixed to the LRC on back of drawing
inscription:
Inscription

LRC, in the print, in black: [I. C (obscured)]; LRC, in margin on mount, in pencil: [30/31]
provenance: Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Nobleman with Fur Breastplate, from "La Noblesse de Lorraine" (verso)
